refnamediv.refpurpose: Frees memory allocated for a previously loaded or created image.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in image. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Frees memory allocated for a previously loaded or created image.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iimagenum -- reference of the image to free.
